name: Turboraketti Remake 2020
description:
Remake of an early 90's gravity game originally made for Commodore Amiga home computer.

Modernized and brought to Windows platform.

Includes OldSkool mode for authentic Amiga like experience.

Enhancements include 1-4 player modes, more screen real estate, music, support for gamepads (incl. analog controls) etc

You can choose to download the Installer (.exe) or standalone package (.zip)

Music by Eric Matyas (Soundimage.org)
